org.joyrest.routing

Class AbstractControllerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joyrest.routing.AbstractControllerConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerConfiguration
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TypedControllerConfiguration

    public abstract class AbstractControllerConfiguration
extends Object
implements ControllerConfiguration

    Class AbstractControllerConfiguration is abstract implementation of ControllerConfiguration and makes easier to create the given route using predefined protected method.

    It can be considered as container for routes which are provided to RequestProcessor because of processing and handling incoming requests.

    Author:
    pbouda

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public final void initialize()
        Method contains a configuration of Route classes and other objects which are in a connection with these routes. This method is considered as a entry point for configuration of routes.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface ControllerConfiguration

      • configure

        protected abstract void configure()
        Convenient place where is possible to configure new routes for this instance of ControllerConfiguration

      • setControllerPath

        protected final void setControllerPath(String path)
        Creates a resource part of the path unified for all routes defined in the inherited class
        Parameters:
        path - resource path of all defined class
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - whether path is null

      • getRoutes

        public Set<InternalRoute> getRoutes()
        Provides set routes configured in ControllerConfiguration.initialize() method of the class implementing this interface.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
